Note: Signed "L. Ravenhill." "B3080 W13089/162A 10.125 7/18 J.W.Ltd. E3388" appears on the bottom left of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French says freedom, equality and brotherhood stop anyone from passing by. Illustration shows women symbols of liberty, equality and brotherhood, holding up flags and swords to prevent any harm to pass them.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Liberté, égalité, fraternité
